title: Alkalized MXene/carbon nanotube composite for stable Na metal anodes
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,12030-12037
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01572J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Weisong Meng, Bo Wang, Junkai Zhao, Guilin Jiang, Chenxiao Chu, Feipeng Cai
An alkalized MXene/carbon nanotube (CNT) composite with large interlayer spaces and “sodiophilic” functional groups can effectively regulate Na deposition behavior.
